content.en: Battery life prediction: Scientists have been exploring various algorithms to accurately predict the remaining useful life of lithium-ion batteries. These algorithms include particle learning framework, exponential model and particle filter, artificial neural network, auto-regression and particle filter, Wiener process and unscented particle filter, grey model and particle filtering, hybrid algorithm of particle filter and extended unbiased finite impulse response filter, extended Kalman particle filter, electrochemical model in the particle filter framework, smooth particle filter-based likelihood approximation method, Dempster-Shafer theory and support vector regression-particle filter, non-parametric aging model and particle filter algorithm, and improved particle filtering algorithm. These algorithms aim to estimate the state-of-health and predict the remaining useful life of lithium-ion batteries, which could have significant implications for battery performance and longevity.
content.da: Batterilevetid forudsigelse: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for nøjagtigt at forudsige den resterende brugbare levetid for lithium-ion batterier. Disse algoritmer inkluderer partikelindlæringsramme, eksponentiel model og partikelfilter, kunstigt neuralt netværk, autoregression og partikelfilter, Wiener proces og unscentet partikelfilter, grå model og partikelfiltrering, hybridalgoritme af partikelfilter og udvidet upartisk finit impuls respons filter, udvidet Kalman partikelfilter, elektrokemisk model i partikelfilter-rammen, glat partikelfilter-baseret sandsynlighedsapproximation metode, Dempster-Shafer teori og supportvektor regression-partikelfilter, ikke-parametrisk aldringsmodel og partikelfilteralgoritme, og forbedret partikelfilteralgoritme. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at estimere sundhedstilstanden og forudsige den resterende brugbare levetid for lithium-ion batterier, hvilket kunne have betydelige konsekvenser for batteriydelse og levetid.
